I am completely delighted in this purchase and I will recommend it to a friend or relative without any hesitation at all. Although there is a learning curve to learn everything this tablet can do, this is undoubtedly the best tablet on the market and there is an endless list of things it is capable of doing. A very user friendly tablet and the retina display is absolutely stunning. As of now, the retina display on this tablet is considered the most stunning, sharpest and crisp display that is possible. I am completely satisfied even though I havent even scratched the surface of what it is capable of doing. Great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Title: Fast, fast, fast
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I have had an IPad 2 for the past 2 years, which I liked. I decided to upgrade, but did not see any great advantage to getting and IPad Air for the extra bump in money.  We live very rural with no internet access, only the 3G on the iPad. I thought the slow download on the 2 was because of our setting - videos were out, pictures took a long time - so when we got the iPad 4, I was pleasantly surprised!  We can watch videos, download stories and generally just peruse the internet while not putting it down and doing something else while it loads!  The picture is marvelous, clear and sharp!  I did not think that would be so important but does make for good reading.  Overall, very glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Temporary problems with iOS
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 4 is my first Apple product. After opening the box and setting my AppleID, I downloaded a few new applications,just to see how everything works. However, I was greatly surprised by noting that none of these applications can beremoved in the usual way (by pressing the icon, waiting for an "x" to appear, etc.). I contacted Apple support; they explainedme how to remove these applications with the help of iTunes on PC. That was OK, but certainly I didn't expect that removingan application should be so complicated. Although the Ipad was declared as being new, I had the impression that somebody used it before and messed the iOS. Being rather disappointed, I start playing with the device for a few days. Not knowing what else to do, I decided to reset the iOS (iOS6 to iOS7). Surprisingly, that was a step that resolved all the problems! The Ipad started working normally, and I don't expect to have similar problems in the future. Nevertheless, such an incorrect behavior of the iOS at the very beginning was frustrating for a device declared as new. Now it works fine.

Reviews.Content: I love it!  It's very thin and lightweight so I can easily slip it into my bag to bring it everywhere. I thought once I had the iPhone and iPod, I really wouldn't need the iPad, but boy was I wrong.  It can easily be addictive. Reviews.Content: Amazing. We love it. THE ONLY TABLET TO EVER BUY! Imitators can't even come close.Incredible battery lifesuper fast and responsiveyou can feel the quality once you hold it in your handthe RETINA DISPLAY is AMAZING!!!! Never go back to a regular display after using itwith apple TV you can steam content from your iPAD to your TV in real time. Reviews.Title: An amazing platform for browsing, media, and iOS apps!
Reviews.Author: C-Dub
Reviews.Content: I was slow to justify the cost of an iPad and despite being a long time fan of Macs, didn't really see the need for one. I found myself in a job where I am on very remote locations with quite a bit of downtime and finally decided that I could use one.I have been absolutely thrilled with this device. It is extremely stable, even with the new iOS 7 operating system. I am very happy that I chose the Retina model, because the screen is basically perfect. For everything from web browsing to watching Netflix, the quality of video and images is second to none.App performance on the iPad Retina is superb, and many of the iPad specific apps are simply mind-blowing, particularly some of the art apps like Sketchbook Pro and Procreate. I recently acquired an Adonit Jot 4, which is a pressure sensitive stylus that connects via Bluetooth, and it works like something out of the future. Just crazy good. For forum participation, writing Amazon reviews, etc., I prefer my laptop simply because I don't like typing on a touchscreen, but that's just my personal preference. I can get around on the touchscreen and if I really wanted a physical keyboard, there are several available. But that's not really what the iPad is all about. It's not there to replace your computer; it's a different type of device that excels at browsing and media consumption and is portable in a way that no laptop is.Though it takes a bit longer than I would like to take a full charge, the battery life is excellent, and I rarely find myself needing to charge when I am out and about.As a media consumption / web browsing device, the iPad Retina is ideal. The screen is so amazing that it is generally preferable to me over a larger computer or laptop screen for these purposes. I take a star off of my rating because USB connectivity would be REALLY helpful for those who would like to watch movies that they have stored on an external drive. There really is no reason that the iPad shouldn't have USB.I love my iPad, and it is so usable in this current configuration that I don't see myself having to replace it with the latest and greatest for many years.

Reviews.Title: very cool

Reviews.Content: My first ipad! Yay..Love it. I got the 32gb and Im able to have all the apps i want so far. I have some pretty big ones for gaming that i thought would take up some space but nope, still got a long ways to go. Anyhow love ipad way better than andriod for my use of it!

Reviews.Title: Made a GREAT anniversary present

Reviews.Title: Easy to Learn
Reviews.Author: Patti Bray
Reviews.Content: Works well as expected.  Easy to use.We use it to video water skiing from a boat.  For this it works even better than we expected.  The skiers can come in and immediately watch their sets and see their mistakes.  We also use it to email, still pictures, and Facebook.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT......seriously buy it you'll love it
Reviews.Author: Joseph Tyckowski
Reviews.Content: absolutely love it. apple has once again exceeded my expectations. my suggestion go with the 32 or 64GB. when you buy it make sure you buy screen protector too. don't wait until you get then buy the screen protectors.

Reviews.Title: What more can one say?
Reviews.Author: Ross Konikoff
Reviews.Content: Words not needed. Elegant machine and excellent shipping. This toy has become a part of life. That, with ease of purchase spells satisfaction %100!

Reviews.Title: i-pad 4 with retina display
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ball
Reviews.Content: Great!! Everything I expected..........Fast deliveryFast setup, works very fast, retina display is awesome.I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for an I-pad

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Kdal
Reviews.Content: I needed this item for my music production as it will play a very important part for live performance, Works well although I should have waited to get the iPad Air but this will do. As the times they are a changing this iPad will prove itself and pay for itself too!!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: 1beachhouse
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad!  I carry it now instead of my laptop!!!  What a convenience!  And it is so much lighter than the laptop so when you are travelling, it makes it so much lighter, plus I don't have another bag to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: xiaolei
Reviews.Content: The iPad is good and the price is good , it's very convenient to use it to receive email and shopping on internet.

Reviews.Title: The best ipad
Reviews.Author: jose luis
Reviews.Content: I always want one of this,and finally i have it,iis very fast,the best device that never existed before,now with all the apps im able whatever i want.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Darcella Crawford
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product, very happy with my new IPad.....would recemend to all others.  Great price also, excellent delivery.  Everything working good.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: rwprince "rwprince3"
Reviews.Content: It works great and you can't beat the choices in aps.  Especially good display.  Works well with wireless.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet
Reviews.Author: Larry McCarty
Reviews.Content: apple simply makes the best tablet. The App Store as many, many apps, and Apples IOS works flawlessly for me.

Reviews.Title: Mobility
Reviews.Author: Karen Bottomley "beachbottom"
Reviews.Content: I can use it when I am sitting in my lounge chair - very helpful - sitting in front of my computer is hard on the body.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Item!
Reviews.Author: tufunuf
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Ipad! It is everything that I expected it to be. And, there is no other place like Amazon when it comes to purchasing an item you want. They stand behind EVERYTHING they sell. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Greatest iPad yet
Reviews.Author: Timothy Hannes
Reviews.Content: Switching from the iPad 2 to this device, I immediately noticed the retina display. The resolution is noticeably better even when your just browsing in Safari. I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a tablet that they will use often to surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Don't know why I waited so long...
Reviews.Author: Lory & David Pratt
Reviews.Content: Could never understand why if I had a desktop and a laptop computer, why I would need or want an iPad. But now I get it!  The Retina Display is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Paw Paw
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 9 IPads for my kids and family for college, leisure, and communicating. This recent purchase will be #10 for my daughter to assist her with her college studies. I also purchased an Otterbox Defender Hornet Series case to protect the IPad, which I highly recommend.  The iPad has an outstanding battery life, the applications are functional and streamlined into the system for an effortless use.  The are many free apps for leisure activities , as well as for professional applications such as Microsoft power point, excel, and word. I'm impressed with the wireless printing function, which integrates well with documents, photos, and spread sheets.  This is an amazing product, it's convent and easy to carry, I hardly ever use my MacBook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Well, it's designed by Apple.
Reviews.Author: Johan Tideskog
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a device that I thought I didn't need since I have an iPhone and a MacBook Pro. But I really benefit from all those apps designed for iPad that really makes it worth its prize. It's just what I use for those tasks when work takes me away from the office over the day and not longer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Butler
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but I love this thing.  It has taken some time and will take more to learn the functionality but so no issues.  I do have it attached to a keyboard (see my NewTrent review) so it automatically shuts the iPad off when closed so I have not had to charge it for over 4 days.The sensitivity is great when playing games or switching pages.  The display itself is simply amazing.  I know it's a bit pricy but the 128gb also leaves you without a worry of filling the thing up or having to delete anything to download or try something new.

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: PRINCESS MONEY
Reviews.Content: Everything you love or desire about an ipad is here. I have no complaints except there is a little lag when using certain apps....but isn't that the apps fault?

Reviews.Title: Apple has done it again!
Reviews.Author: S. J. Jewett
Reviews.Content: The Retina Display is adjustable to the light in your environment.  iPad quickly downloads programs and is super easy to use!  If you're even thinking about a tablet, this is the one to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful & Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Karen yarter
Reviews.Content: Takes awesome pictures!  Love the apps. I owned an iPad for nearly 4 years then gave it to my son and bought the kindle Fire HD.. After 4 months I sent it back and purchased the iPad 4. Oh what a feeling I so missed and do love the iPad 4,. Never gonna give you up again.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet i've owned
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: i bought this tablet not knowing what to expect and i was blown away the second i opened the package. it has a good processor

Reviews.Title: Really good construction
Reviews.Author: Carlos Maymi
Reviews.Content: Good construction and operating system. Really fast processing, still too pricey when compared with other tablets, I guess you pay a premium for Apple products. I hope they re-think this marketing approach.

Reviews.Title: Wnderful product
Reviews.Author: Gen517
Reviews.Content: The iPad for is a great product for college, it is very convenient to have your books right on your tablet. Not having to carry a huge book to class is amazing. Great features and games from the store is also available. I love my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Hazel Smith
Reviews.Content: I use my I-pad for face-time with our grandkids. I also like to play my games and do puzzles without losing pieces.  It has a reminder calendar, so I can keep track of all my appointments and e-mail along with my scriptures and church apps, and phone numbers.  I can used it for almost everything except as a phone.

Reviews.Title: it is nice
Reviews.Author: Yunus Emre
Reviews.Content: İt is nice. easy to use. because it is useful. i recommend to everyone. if you ne tablet, you can buy this

Reviews.Title: Great, have been using it for e-mail and work.
Reviews.Author: Edward G. Wong
Reviews.Content: Clarity of image on the screen is unbelievable, very happy with product.  Only wish I had known they would be coming out with newer iPad so soon before I bought this iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brion Douvis
Reviews.Content: Im loving it. Fr met my needs. Arrived a little late. Though I like the retina screen and all the features

Reviews.Title: Great I-pad
Reviews.Author: Chris Stanton
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife so she can Skype with the kids and grandkids and play her games on instead of on her phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Difei Zhou
Reviews.Content: I m a pilot,the iPad helps me a lot,I do not need to take so many books with me any more. The iPad 4 also did vary well in games

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Girlybug
Reviews.Content: I finally got on the IPAD bandwagon. I absolutely love it! I am still learning how to used it, compatible applications and what accessories are available.  Woohoo!!!

Reviews.Title: My 2nd iPad
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Deal
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first iPad over a year ago - what was that?  the iPad 2, I think?  I used it every single day and loved it...but my husband was starting to get jealous.  Even though he had a laptop, he wanted a tablet, too. So, like any good husband, he bribed me.I could get a brand new iPad if he could adopt my older one.  DEAL!!!So now I'm the proud owner of the iPad with Retina display.  I will tell you.....I really don't notice much of a difference between this one and my older one.  But, I still love it!

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: Frosty
Reviews.Content: However shipper sent me defective unit (Got Electronics.) But I was able to get a replacement w/out too much difficulty.

Reviews.Title: iPad 16GB
Reviews.Author: ADREON
Reviews.Content: This was a requirement for High School; my Son commandeered it immediately.  Has it running his "ebooks", as well as games.  Easy to use!Delivery was super fast!!!

Reviews.Title: I love my IPad
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use and easy to take with when you need to. I like the bigger size, it's much easier to read than the mini.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Anthony M. Coy
Reviews.Content: Item was delivered as promised and met all the expectations that i had for the iPad.  Would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kenneth roberts
Reviews.Content: I use it all the time and love it. An awesome product from apple like everything else in their line of products

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Ralph Burgess
Reviews.Content: Excellant, the screen is a perfect size and very easy to use. Loved the camera feature and overall functions of the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with these products.
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Bell
Reviews.Content: These products exceeded my expectations.  I am enjoying the convenience, compared to my pc.  I am still learning how to use all of the functions.  I am enjoying different aspects, such as the camera and how easy it is to take a picture and immediately  send it to friends.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!!!
Reviews.Author: Jaianan Hirai
Reviews.Content: this was a birthday gift for my wife and she loves it so much....so far no probs....it was delivered way before estimated time...good job...

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Satish
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and I got a 32 gb. Gifted it to my dearest wife. She is loving it.

Reviews.Title: The best Ipad ever
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: Faster, Cooler, and definitely much better than its ancestors. I have had the two previous ones and definitely love this. Great purchase!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Good Shopper
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my iPAD. So glad I bought it with the wi fi.Love the white color matches mi iPhone 5.Set them both up on my Version account linked them together.

Reviews.Title: Great new iPad!
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Fast, great screen and handles all the high powered apps I needed. an improvement over the original ipad.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: I was finally able to get an i-pad through Amazon.com!
Reviews.Author: V. K. Walker
Reviews.Content: I have wanted one of these I-pads since they came out, but was finally able to get one. It is so versatile and useful in many situations where using my lap-top would be difficult. I love it!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: jarrett thrash
Reviews.Content: This nothing more to say for this because it speak for it self the apple iPad 4 god I'm glad I bought this baby for me for movies, games and music and I bought it for my mother for work and to keep in touch will all of us.

Reviews.Title: Great, as expected!
Reviews.Author: Maria Pilar Isaurralde
Reviews.Content: The IPad works great, everything was as expected. I love it! I decided yo buy the one without 3G and I think it was a good decision.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!
Reviews.Author: j.k.
Reviews.Content: Got mine for 550.  It works great! It's strange using this iPad then going to my iPhone..  It makes the iPhone look so small and I feel like I'm going blind when I look at my iPhone after using the iPad for a while.  Great product!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Jerry E. Klein
Reviews.Content: First time user of the Apple iPad. Did not take long to figure things out. It also helps to have a younger person around to show you how to do some things.

Reviews.Title: The Real Tablet
Reviews.Author: Albert C. Marth "Albert c. Marth"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my I-Pad!  I replaced the Samsung tablet I purchased about 4 months ago.  The Samsung I felt was a good tablet.  I won't say I was anti Apple but I was trying to justify my reasons for buying the Samsung.  I got tired of hearing how good Apple is....how clear the picture is compared to Samsung etc.  so, I purchased an Apple I-pad.  I figured I still have my Samsung.  If I don't like the Apple I will return it and get my money back.After using my Apple for a few weeks now, I am totally sold on this product!  If fact I am considering a total change to Apple for all of my computer needs!  Next it will be a switch from my Dell desktop to the Apple 27 inch desktop.  I have been a Dell customer for approximately 20 years!Apple is a more expensive way to go, but I feel it is the best way for me.  I think Apple products are very much worth the price difference..in my opinion!Why have I strayed somewhat away from the review of the Apple I-pad!  I wanted to express my feelings about a company that I could care less about that changed because of 1 of their products....the Apple iPad with the Retina Display MD511 LL/A (32 GB, Wi -Fi, Black).  If you want total satisfaction with an iPad, the tablet is for you!

Reviews.Title: new to apple products
Reviews.Author: John Morris
Reviews.Content: It is taking a little getting used to, but does what I had hoped.  The speech app mimics a special purpose communication device that costs 20 times as much.  I think we will like it even more as we learn to use it fully.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Paul Chung
Reviews.Content: It was in perfect condition.Everything that came along with it worked and I'm very happy with the product.Definitely a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I bought my sister an iPad with retina display last week it was awesome.shipment was fast.Works find all along nothing misplacment.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lopez
Reviews.Content: This iPad was purchased for my oldest daughters birthday.  She absolutley loves it and I would definitely recommend that you purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product and seller
Reviews.Author: Rick Rankin
Reviews.Content: Got product in a timely manner and in the condition requested but had problems with my lifeproof case I put on it and thought it was my ipad and instead so it took me a while to do this review because I thought my ipad was messed up. Turns out lifeproof sold me an earlier version of the case instead of the new one and it was pushing the home button in causing my ipad to shut off. Called apple and they went through all the checks and found the issue and now my ipad is great. Happy with every....

Reviews.Title: Grandma loves this.
Reviews.Author: Robert Dunlap
Reviews.Content: We got this for our grandmother and it took her about 3 hours to get used to this product which is quite amazing seeing that she is 78 years old. Gotta love the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Ipad retina
Reviews.Author: Van Rensburg Kevin
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  It is extremely user friendly and I love the keyboard, especially in landscape view.Delivery time was excellent and I am giving it an all round 5 stars.Thanks Apple and Amazon for a great product.

Reviews.Title: THE VERY BEST!!!! GO 4 IT  ;)
Reviews.Author: Sydney Thomas
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and she LOVES IT.  she gets on it every single day  ;) expensive but WORTH IT new toy!!!

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long
Reviews.Author: Jeff Race
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. I absolutely love my iPad. I use it everyday for watching television balancing my checkbook texting with friends what else can I say!

Reviews.Title: Great but beware
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: After three attempts I think I finally have a good ipad.  My first one the forward camera stopped working and I had to send it back.  The second one came from the IPADSHOP fulfilled by Amazon and when I checked the warranty it was used and only had 6mo of warranty left.  The box was wrapped in plastic to make it look new but was obviously not the same plastic that comes from the factory.  I have read of others having the same experience with the ipadshop.  So, google apple warranty check and check your serial number to make sure it is a new one. Amazon was great as usual and I had no problems returning the defective one and the used one.  They even waved the shipping on the third because of what happened.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's the original touch screen tablet. Enough said, right?
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The 4th generation iPad is an iPad - that's enough to get the point across, right? We all know the iPad is the touch screen equivalent of the gold medal - others have come & gone, but it's still what every other tablet is compared to. Regarding this model, the only major difference between the 4th generation & the 3rd is a more powerful processor, but the amazing Retina screen remains the same - & as someone with a 2013 Macbook Air too which doesn't have a Retina display, the Retina screen is quite a difference.  I use my MA more for computing, while the iPad (to me) is more of an entertainment device - & its screen is definitely perfect for it.  Pixelation is all but a thing of the past with this baby!  Overall, I use this for Netflix & YouTube (& occasionally checking email, Facebook, etc.), but really, for a tablet & everything that goes with that, the iPad is everything you could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Great for emails
Reviews.Author: Rita Foster "Reading Fiend"
Reviews.Content: This is great or traveling and emails anytime.  There is so much to learn and so many apps to use.  I am still learning.

Reviews.Title: My New Appendage
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: My iPad seems to be attached to me now, as I hardly ever put it down.  My poor laptop is lonely and sad because I hardly ever touch it anymore.  This thing does everything!  The photos that it takes are much better than the ones I take with my camera.  It's perfect for FaceTime with family that lives far away.  So lightweight and easy to use.  I don't use my kindle anymore either, since it's easier to read with the iPad.  Can't say enough nice things about it! ☺

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Gregory
Reviews.Content: Got just what I wanted. It was exactly as described and definitely exceeded my expectations with the item being used.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Chad Seelye
Reviews.Content: I've been an iPhone user for years, so I knew what to expect, but the larger screen size has been great!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Lin Gan
Reviews.Content: I got this because I was bored but have always felt turned off and intimidated by technology.  So when it arrived I did not open the box for weeks until a friend came to visit and set the whole thing up for me.  Now I use it all the time and really love it.

Reviews.Title: Favorite purchase of the year
Reviews.Author: Alicia Willis
Reviews.Content: When I first got it my music wouldn't download from the cloud. Went to local apple store reset the iPad and it was perfect. The iPad is wonderful,I take it with me everywhere. It's really fast the retina display makes pics vivid.

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: amazing just like when i got a new ipad2 except the camera is much better quality and the glass hopefully wont shatter like the ipad2 did

Reviews.Title: It's Great!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Nill
Reviews.Content: I am a newcomer to iPad.  I have a Nook, and love it, and didn't think I would have any real need or use for an iPad.  However, I am loving it because there are so many more Apps for iPad than for other tablets.  I went with the "lots of memory" one because for the price difference between it and its lesser cousin (64 GB) it is worth going for the one with more memory.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Congratulations! Excelent service!
Reviews.Author: Alessandra Bourguignon Gagno
Reviews.Content: My cousin Luciana, who lives in California, came to Brazil and brought the Ipad to me.I met the site through her and I enjoyed!I indicate.Alessandra

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for me
Reviews.Author: Ben Olberg
Reviews.Content: The price point is the only part that stings, other than that Apple has the best tablets on the market.  Since we already have several apple devices and lots of apps and media purchased through itunes, this tablet made the most sense for our family.  Sharp display, snappy operating system, I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great color
Reviews.Author: Stewart Lewis
Reviews.Content: Great color - quick response. like the camera that goes both ways. screen is very clear. speed is great. love it!

Reviews.Title: I love it, but it's not a replacement for a computer
Reviews.Author: Clint Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this product, but I hate that it does not work with Flash.We bought this thinking we could use this instead of a computer, but it's a hassle not having Microsoft Office. I'd like to be able to plug a stick drive into this, too, but it doesn't have one. Also, it can't hook up to my printer to print things.Well, maybe the iPad could do all these things mentioned above, but I'm not sure how to do it all. Also, i wish i could have multiple apps open at once. Other than that, it is fast, it is easy to use and the display is amazing. It works amazingly with the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: nathaniel house
Reviews.Content: I had been contiplating for a while to get an I pad and I am glad I finally did. Only con I can see is it can't do office docs and you can't access things on flash player. Other than that it is great for browsing and playing.

Reviews.Title: It's an APPLE product
Reviews.Author: Norman C. Bauer "stormincb"
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad, but it sure leaves a lot to imagination when you get it. Almost no written instructions, so you're expected to go on-line for how to use it etc. How do you do that with no help?

Reviews.Title: iPad is great
Reviews.Author: Brian Humphreys
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd iPad I've owned and it performs much better than previous versions.  The retina display makes reading so much easier on the eyes.  The clarity is remarkable.  The processor also seems to be improved as the transitioning between apps is now quicker.

Reviews.Title: more of the same
Reviews.Author: WxGesr
Reviews.Content: Had Generation 3.  4 is more of the same, but better.  Completely satisfied and recommend the product.  Believe the black is more business like appearing than the white.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPAD with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: CathyK
Reviews.Content: This IPAD is very lightweight, easy to use and fun!  It takes great pictures and I'm able to watch movies downloaded from Netflix with no problem.

Reviews.Title: iPad Fourth Generation with 64GB Memory and Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: John K. Wiebe "Kirk Wiebe"
Reviews.Content: Well made, elegant, and both my wife and I find it very, very easy to use.  With the right apps (readily available), it nicely replaces her laptop.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: As a previous android user, I was against apple products. BUT I am so very glad I made the switch!!! I couldn't be happier with the IPad and Iphone products. They are very user friendly and super convienent.I purchased the IPad through Amazon and am very very happy about it. It arrived quickly and was packed securely. It is also very easy to set up myself

Reviews.Title: this was nice
Reviews.Author: Betty Aldridge-Brown "B J"
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife my 3rd generation and bought this one. this was a good buy. not to expensive and a very good device. I hope all of you out there can get a deal like I did. contact this company and just maybe. my thank to those that sold it to me

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: CHERI
Reviews.Content: It is fast and I have a lot of space. I have had previous models but lightening is the fastest yet.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Amazing product although I don't know if it is retina display. It works fantastic screen looks great. Pictures look great. I like the apps you can get for free.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat skeptical of purchasing this online for my 9 year old son. However it arrived on time and we were all pleased and my son of course was extatic to say the least.I did purchase the square trade protection plan as well.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great...
Reviews.Author: Mark Meeks
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone that I used to use to play games, but haven't used it for that since getting this.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product, Fast Delivery as always with AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Paula delaPena
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with the product. The ipad4 is an awesome device. My son works for APPLE so it really helps with getting to know all of it's capabilities.

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: mattelynn renee hardesty
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition, I use it more than my cellphone and laptop. I Cant put it down <3

Reviews.Title: I am all day with it. And no need any more the note book.
Reviews.Author: Graciela Piñeyrúa
Reviews.Content: My son gift me a tablet one and I loved it and decide to buy a new like this. I always said everybody how happy I am to get it.

Reviews.Title: upgrading from iPad1, this is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: pol
Reviews.Content: love the speed, resolution, feeling when holding, the new connector.I was expecting the device to get uncomfortably hot (as read in some reviews) but it stays really cool with my current usage (browsing, email, youtube, reading).battery life is also exceptional.want the best tablet of the moment? this is it!

Reviews.Title: What is there left to say?
Reviews.Author: J. Hanks
Reviews.Content: This is an iPad.  It works wonderfully as such. It makes for a lousy Android tablet. It has good battery life, but is not a good replacement for batteries generally. The retina display is crisp, but compares unfavorably with a frosty autumn morning. It's too heavy too be a replacement for your kindle, but would be a wonderful alternative to avoid carrying around a complete encyclopedia. If you like Apple products you will love it. However, I do not recommend baking it into a pie.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Katherine E. Cavarretta "k t cav"
Reviews.Content: no issues whatsoever.  I love my iPad!! The seller followed up with me to  make sure I was satisfied with my purchase, and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: MORE THAN SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Bernard
Reviews.Content: After purchasing this unit. I fell in love with its performance. I ordered headphones, speakers a I TB hard drive storage device and other items.to enhance my experience. I like the mobility of not being confined to a desk. This unit is light nd easy to carry, even with its assessories.

Reviews.Title: I Pad 4 great tool for business AND entretaiment.
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Porcella "Juan Carlos Porcella"
Reviews.Content: Light weight, easy to use and many features for daily use. However, accesories are very expensive and hardware to find.

Reviews.Title: Ready to Travel
Reviews.Author: wlstott
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, this was a great purchase for us - my wife loves it. We both are excited to travel on our boat using our ipad to navigate and stay in touch with family and friends!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: book lover
Reviews.Content: I is exactly what I wanted.  It works perfectly.  Very glad I purchased it.  I love to read and it makes a great reader and I use it a lot for emails and etc.  Handier  than my large computers.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: momof3
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect fit for my life.  Can do all my work on the go and at home! And so light weight!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Ale
Reviews.Content: Very good. Excellent Product. Would recommend it for everyone. It. Was way beyong my expectations and definetely surprised my kids. The entire family is enjoying it. Seller was also quick shipper

Reviews.Title: Nice Display
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I love it so much. The display looks fantastic, and the processing speed is much faster than the old models.

Reviews.Title: I simply love it. The retina display makes everything look sharp and vibrant.
Reviews.Author: C. William Mack "Rent2Own Guy"
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned an iPad before so I can't comment on older models, but just for the beautiful graphics, I would up grade to this  model.

Reviews.Title: After using a friends 'surface', im glad i kept my i pad
Reviews.Author: Mark C.
Reviews.Content: no wonder sales of SURFACE are in the dumpster.....its like an unfinished product-their new 'ZUNE' and screw windows 8-7 is good enough for me

Reviews.Title: love is the word
Reviews.Author: mild mannered moderator
Reviews.Content: i have owned computers since 1980. i have always been a pc owner except for one macbook which i wasn;t enthralled with. so i did have a concern or two about the ipad but truly wanted one. hubby solved the decision by getting it as a valentines/birthday combo gift. it took about 30 seconds to learn the basics and buy my first apps, lol. it is now in use for at least half of my computer time. the laptop is starting to feel lonely, lol.the screen clarity is amazing and the ease of operation is awesome. i am shocked at what it can do and the lack of limitations in use. better yet, i bought one for my husband who is not as computer literate and he is having much less difficulty with it than with the pc he has used for years.i'm sold, he's sold... my advice is: if in doubt, buy it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jaimerz88
Reviews.Content: I finally broke down and bought and ipad. I wish I would have done it sooner! The retina display is amazing! It's a great ipad.

Reviews.Title: Love Our New iPad.
Reviews.Author: Keith Leech
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace a ASUS TF 101.  The ASUS had become very aggravating, with freezing up, restarts, and inconsistent operation.  The iPad operates pretty much flawlessly.  We are very impressed with it.  This is our first but probably not our last Apple product!

Reviews.Title: Great Apple Product!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: You cannot go wrong with an Apple product and the Ipad fits very well with the rest of the Apple line up.

Reviews.Title: Better than eyecandy

Reviews.Content: One more happy IPad owner. It is better than candy! Very thrilled with the sensitive screen touch. It is all good! Came in three days sooner than expected. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!

Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and has a beautiful display! Going to use it everyday for work and play. Many great apps to download also.

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: I only use Apple products and this one definitely did not disappoint.  Personally, I think Apple's products are very user friendly.  If someone has a question or issue, they can quickly refer to the user guide using iBooks.  Take my iPad with me everywhere!

Reviews.Content: Love the product! this is my first Apple product even though I have worked on them over the years. Now is see where the love of these products comes from.I Got a great deal and it came before projected date of delivery. LOVE THAT.

Reviews.Content: It wasn't the cheapest price around, but I used American Express points and $200 to purchase my iPad. Now... That's a great bargain. It's everything they said they said about it.  And... It arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Love it can't put it down

Reviews.Title: Excellent product! Very easy to use and a true joy not to carry a laptop arround.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Since then, I have it clear, there is no better tablet in the market right now, from the HW point of view. I missed the simplicity of using Android, above all everything related to files management (I do not like iTunes)

Reviews.Title: very happy

Reviews.Title: First Mac Purchasse
Reviews.Author: J. Ray "Searcher1"
Reviews.Content: My first Mac purchase was this IPad and so far it's been great. No problems with setup but am still learing all the ins and outs. Haven't explored all the possibilities of it yet but soon.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Combs
Reviews.Content: The new Apple iPad 5 does exactly what I needed a tablet to do. Very fast, vivid colors, looks great. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device.
Reviews.Author: Ha b.
Reviews.Content: This product is incredible item, i love it. I do not know how it works in the future, but it works so well now. It connects to the web as quick as lightning.After using for few months, the iPad is still working well, but the home charger had the problem. After 30 or 45 minutes, the charger was very hot, I must unplug it and wait until it was cool down and plug in again. It took so long for fully charge on my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but still over-priced
Reviews.Author: Tybee Island
Reviews.Content: As well as they work, they continue to charge too much for the iPad and accompanying memoryHope they will change that.

Reviews.Title: Love my Retina Display Ipad!
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Steffens
Reviews.Content: This Ipad has amazing clarity..It goes really well with the Logitech hard slim keyboard case.  I also have applied the 2 Gorilla skins which protects both the ipad side and the keyboard side.

Reviews.Title: Apple I Pad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Sara Brandt
Reviews.Content: It isn't that we don't like our Apple I pad, but it does take some time to get use to it, after using a standard computer.  We found that i pad for  Dummies (seniors) was very helpful.  Over all we like our apple because it is easier to carry than our laptop.

Reviews.Title: Finally, Ready for Business. And families.
Reviews.Author: Tate Linden "Thingnamer"
Reviews.Content: I bought my first tablet computer about a decade ago and was severely disappointed with the functionality. Nothing was intuitive, everything required additional steps, nothing tied in with anything else. Today's generation of tablets has solved these issues and more. And they've done it in a way that is useful for home or business users considering tablet solutions.I now am able to run my organization's billing, reporting, presentations, and speeches from my handheld tablet. I can pair it with my iphone to control presentations remotely, or use it (in combination with special software and hardware add-ons) as a teleprompter. I haven't yet gotten to the point that I will travel without my laptop computer, but I'm getting close.On the flip side, when I get home the iPad serves as an entertainment hub for the family, controlling our entertainment center, providing affordable gaming for the kids (or me on occasion), and connecting me with my network of friends.The only downside is that this (in combination with the iPhone) makes it very difficult to unplug yourself and just experience life as it happens. I've walked into rooms when relatives are visiting and found every single person looking at their phones or iPads instead of chatting with each other. Of course, that may just be because we're all pretty boring.

Reviews.Title: IPad de Apple con Retina Display MD512LL / A 64GB, Wi-Fi, Negro
Reviews.Author: José Navas
Reviews.Content: Excellent team worth investing in something like this, I'm very happy with my purchase I recommend here in Venezuela I work very well.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff!

Reviews.Title: Excellent service and quality. I am happy. Blue Glass Solutions is the best

Reviews.Title: Fast

Reviews.Title: My new iPad

Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected and then some. I recommend it highly. I hardly ever use my laptop anymore since it's so portable I always carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my iPad  there is a lot i need to learn  It is great and I am looking forward to learn a lot

Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for the 2 year old original iPad and looked at a number of Android tablets as well as Windows 8 tablets. In the end decided to go with iPad 4 and feel it was a good decision. The screen is amazing, the overall experience with the device is much improved compared to the original iPad. Transferring content and apps from the old device to the new one was painless, everything transferred perfectly except for one odd weather app which had to be reinstalled.

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Title: Love

Reviews.Title: Yes Love is the word :)

Reviews.Content: This 128GB iPad has been totally enjoyed by my son, I gave it to him because he would use my corporate iPad endlessly and you know  I needed it too.My son is autistic and this device keeps him focused and gaming for now.There are apps for speech games that I will load for him as we go forward.I would recommend this iPad to all people of earth.Thank You

Reviews.Content: I did not have tothink too much about this.  I got an iPad six months ago and my wife wanted a similar one.  Wish I couldhave kept this newer version.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy Happy it looks great

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases ive made
Reviews.Author: Vironka Davis
Reviews.Content: i'm a post graduate student and bought this ipad for school. it is a great educational tool and is worth every penny. i havent had any problems at all with my ipad from this seller. im not an apple geek and this is my only apple product, but i couldn't be happier with it. its great to be able to take notes and highlight on my textbook and class notes right on the ipad and have less to carry around.

Reviews.Title: I had no Internet connection problems at all
Reviews.Author: sumrsolo
Reviews.Content: The seller was great and this arrived 3 days earlier than what was expected! I love it and it came in excellent condition. I don't know what a lot of people are talking about this iPad 4 having problems connecting to their wireless Internet and crashing a lot. This hasn't happened to me once yet and I'm not saying it hasn't happened to them but it is probably their internet's fault and not the device's fault because I have like the cheapest Internet and the cheapest Internet router but mine connects fine and hasn't crashed once. So that should tell you something. This is my first iPad and the only thing I will complain about is the battery life. It is terrible but then again I'm on mine a lot since I need it so much with making YouTube videos and doing my other work on it like my poetry. This is my only computer so I rely on it a ton. It is reliable in everything else though so I just suggest that you keep a wall adapter and charger handy wherever you are.

Reviews.Title: loving my new ipad 4th gen 64GB White:)

I can now leave my netbook at home and bring my ipad to my university to take notes!This iPad 4th gen 64GB White is beautiful. Came with iOS 6.0 and I jailbroke it within minutes with evasi0n!I just ordered the best cover ever: Snugg iPad 4 & iPad 3 Case - Leather Case Cover and Flip Stand with Elastic Hand Strap and Premium Nubuck Fibre Interior (White) - Automatically Wakes and Puts the iPad 4 & 3 to Sleep. Reviews.Title: Love!

Reviews.Content: I love the ipad. Easy to use, beautiful display, all my apps in one place! This is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Totally Awesome

Reviews.Content: I just love my Ipad 4 64 GB I am so addicted to it, I use it all the time I recently returned it for the wifi with AT&T; so I can have internet access 24/7 no matter where I am whether it's in the car at the park or in a location that is not wifi ready. I love the games I love looking up different things on the internet.  I went two whole weeks without watching tv because the tablet itself is soo entertaining.  I bought books to read on it movies and the clarity of the pictures are awesome I took pictures at my brothers wedding and it came out gorgeous people were saying instead of hiring a photographer they could have hired me. I downloaded some app that frame the pictures and decorated it very nicely.  I just love it. This is my very first tablet and I love it, this is a must have.  I also bought the office word app so I can type, I just have to get my air printer and Im all set don't even use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: This iPad is everything I wanted in a tablet - I hardly use my laptop now!

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Title: its great!

Piece of junk.  Ad I believe it's truly the only time in life I had a problem with electronic item.  Cuz I don't use them too much.  Te ipad has been awesome.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: dlb "blue"
Reviews.Content: We have a fleet of devices, tablets included. The kids need the iPad for school. My husband bought me the new iPad 4, 4th generation with the fastest chip. We have the other brands of tablets in our home too for all of the kids as well as for the 3 of us, my elderly aunt included, so you can choose almost any brand of tablet or device to use. The iPad 4, the only one that is the 4th generation is in constant demand over all of the others, iPads except for the iPad mini, the others,  Samsung is the least popular, the Nexus they will use  and there is another brand I won't name. LOLThe iPad 4 is so fast, remarkably so, the Retina Display is simply picture perfect, the colors do not overwhelm like other brands to with their overly saturated colors. The wifi has the best connection I've had on a mobile device. The App Store makes it even nicer with the wealth of full sized tablet Apps, not stretched out phone apps, along with the ability to watch your movies, listen to your music and use 3rd party apps to access all of your Amazon content. It has Netflix, the Kindle App, Video App from Amazon, so much. I can't find anything to complain about and I don't have anything that I can't find on here to use for fun or for work.It's an A++++++choice for us and the best out there at this time I feelOh Itunes U is a phenomenal addition to any iPad

Reviews.Title: She loves it!!

Love the extra features.  I didn't expect to see such a difference.  If the battery holds up, (I have only used this for a couple nows) I expect that I will not go back to the Android tablet.

It is also very convenient because it's size makes it easy to use around the house, outside when we are enjoying the weather, or if we are traveling.  It is all we hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!

Reviews.Title: awesome

We have a HP laptop that can do somethings that the IPad cannot like our IPhone5 and 4Gs but I rarley even turn my laptop on now...My Hubby also bought me the keyboard with WiFi (bluetooth) and that is just iceing on top ! You can't bet the price and the lighting fast IPad 4.

Reviews.Title: Great love it!

Works great with a nearby Wi-Fi, but also with my iPhone which has a built in "Hotspot."  Apple is the best!

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad

Reviews.Title: I'm loving it

Let me say there are several nice options from Samsung and google as well as other tablets that may do a few things better. Overall the iPad is the best tablet on the market as of right now. I use it everyday from listening to music and podcast to watching movies and reading various news articles. The screen resolution is amazing the sound is nice and strong. I would recommend it and if possible get at least 32g

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Ginny Calderon
Reviews.Content: This iPad is everything I thought it would be and then more! All Apple products that I have tried are easy to navigate and understand. I am enjoying my iPad.

Reviews.Title: I love this IPad.
Reviews.Author: Dominick Castrogiovanni
Reviews.Content: I love this thing I use it everyday to read & watch movies on it. I even take it everywhere with me instead of my lap-top. I don't any complaints on it at all.

Reviews.Title: Sorry, I will gave amazon 5 stars.
Reviews.Author: Jan. w "Jan. W."
Reviews.Content: I ordered an ipad 4 16gb wifi, but I got one that was an ipad 3 16 gb.Yes, I bought from amazon warehouse deal, nearly $400, but Ipad 4 is an ipad4 , you can not ship another one to replace it?I did not know about the different between 3 and 4, but my daughter knows them very well, she showed me the youtube,the physicaldifference about ipad 3 and 4 is the connection cable, that is why I post my review here, just be careful !!!when you receive any ipad from amazon, make sure, you got what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: At this point I have to rate this product a 1 because after TEN HOURS of charging it wont work.  Not with the "on/home" button trick, nada.  All I ever got on the screen was the low battery symbol when I first plugged it in and now nada.  Very disappointed and now have to go through the ordeal of returning it when I really do not have the time as this was purchased using a grant and I have less than a month to show success with students using it or it comes out of my pocket.  Joy.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I don't like iPad
Reviews.Author: M&M; "MyTrueComment"
Reviews.Content: Tablets are now better and better.  When iPad 2 came out, it was good.  iPad 4 spec was appealing.  However, I found there are some issues on iPad 4.1.  Heavy.  It is as heavy as 7 inch blackberry playbook.2.  It has been like that on setup.  You need iTune or wifi.  I don't have a Windows PC or Mac, and I need mac address to connect to my router.  How can I do it?  Apple did not think about this problem.3.  No setup guide, not a sheet of instruction.4.  Not to mention the price cost more than others.I have not connect the tablet yet.  Probably let me kid connect to his iTune and get the Mac address.  More to come.I have the ASUS tf700, and I like it a lot.  My opinion, it is better than iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure whether I should rate it as 1 star, but
Reviews.Author: Xuebo
Reviews.Content: The fact is that I bought this on amazon as a gift to my wife as a bday gift. I ordered it on Monday night, it arrived on Thurs afternoon. Slightly slower than what I expected (I am amazon prime, so I have 2 day delivery free). But that is ok.The product was delivered in sealed condition with "original" package ---- at least I could not find any sign of previous usage or anything. Everything so far is so good.Then we started to initialize this Ipad. It gave me black screen for a short time, which I thought it was just normal --- probably it was loading something. And after that, it seemed to be normal all the way to the end of the setup phase. The next thing we do is to download google Chrome on it. It briefly showed a "shaky" "blurred" screen for a second or so. And then back to normal.Then we started to explore its functionality like taking pictures etc. The frequency of "shaky" screen by now increases. Then we tried to download some free games. After we downloaded the first free game (I do not remember which, our purpose was just testing) app, it went black. This time for 15 minutes or so. This time, I do not think it is normal any more.But after that, we were able to restart it. Just to find that it is now a norm of showing shaky screens all the time. And then we were browsing to find apple support using it. It is then the whole thing died. It won't come back any more. So we had to send it back.I do not know who I should blame the problem to, or just unlucky to hit this one.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 09-24-2013 came with a screeen scratch and problem with with iIOS 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia CCS-400097
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars. But even though the Amazon Market Place's packaging for shipment was as good as required for shipping and delivering this type of merchandise, and that the Apple iPad factory box was undamaged, both wrappings intact and unopened, the iPad screen came with a noticeable two centimeter hairline scratch on top center, right below the camera lens. The scratch was visible through the factory envelope-like cellophane wrapping around the iPad itself. That type of scratch, could not had happened at the seller's warehouses, nor during transportation/delivery because it requires direct contact with the screen to produce it and as I explained the delivery package and product box where undamaged and unopened, so responsibility lies with manufacturing facility during or before final boxing of the iPad, which says a little of quality assurance and control in this case. That is, I do not blame Amazon nor the seller for the problem in this particular case (first time ever).That aside, the new iPad is working nicely and has a great retina display (colors, graphics, resolution...) and great speed. But I still will not give it the fourth and fifth stars, because contrary to what I'm used, and expect, to get from Apple products, this one didn't have that mint condition look that I expected from and Apple's new item. Instead of going trough the process of returning with all the time delay and implications (customs in my country for once)I installed a anti-glare/mate screen protector to "hide" the scratch, which somehow defeats the purpose of the great retina displayIMPORTANT UPDATE: IOS 7 have a feature that cannot be turned of, which verifies that the Lightning connector is certified by Apple, and as soon as I update to IOS 7, and connected my iPad to be charged with the Lightning connector that came with the iPad in the original, brand new, sealed and unopened factory box I got a pop up display that stated that my iPad connector isn't certified and my not function properly with my iPad. I reported this to apple via chat support and the agent told me, after running an online diagnostic, that my device and connectors were new and that it was a glitch in the IOS 7 verifying routine that would be fixed on a next release (update of IOS 7), so I dismissed (every time) the message and charged my iPad without problems. But that was until today, after connecting the new iPad with the supposedly original Apple lightning connector and receiving the  warning message, the iPad stop charging after reaching 27% charge. Beware, either don't buy this model or wait until Apple issues some kind of correction or update removing that verifying routine from IOS 7. Right now for me, living outside the US this is a disaster, returning the device, for me is not an option. So I will have to take my iPad to a Venezuelan authorized service center, testing and probably buying a new "original" lightning connector, cause if I buy the Apple care plan in the US It won't be applicable in my country.

Reviews.Title: This bad boy rocks!!!!
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: Everything good about this device which you may have heard by now is total truth.  I bought this exact model yesterday and I have just one problem.  I can't put it down!I did a side by side comparison with my old iPad and it's like holding a rotary phone next to a smartphone.  No comparison.  Until I started using this new model yesterday, I didn't think I was missing anything but I was wrong.  So what are you waiting for?  Go buy one and see for yourself!Setup took no time because I regularly use iTunes and was able to replicate all the contents from my old iPad to my new one.  I think my hubbie might have to have one too so he can enjoy it once in a while.  Prying it out of my hands is outta the question.  :DI recommend a Satellite wireless external Hard Drive and a leather cover with pro Bluetooth keyboard and a 2 yr extended warranty.  I figure by then, there will be something new to buy anyway.I might just go back to reading books now too.  Any excuse to use this baby.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: What can I say...great product. I'm not a very techie person but the iPad is user friendly, light, and has a great battery life. The display is crystal clear. I did have to update the software when it arrived because the camera and photo app would not work. I was ready to go the Apple store for them to trouble shoot it but my friend figured it out first.

Reviews.Title: Careful- wrong iPad sent
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: The box showed the latest iPad A1458 but the older model was in the box (A1416) along with the older style 30-pin connector.  Sending back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: So  DONE apple products
Reviews.Author: KEK
Reviews.Content: It is not the iPad as much as the apple os updates which keep messing up my iTunes and songs.  I have purchased and extensive library of songs and the past two updates have caused the songs to no longer be found showing them as not available on my iPad but trying to direct me to the cloud.  I think this is apples way of trying to force customers to pay for their cloud space which I am not interested in. It took me Hours to fix it the first time and it has happened again. Since I have all my music also on a backup drive... It is time to try a new tablet and no more apple for us.  Apple support is no help.  We are now looking at a galaxy tab and will go for that and drop all apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade experience
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I bought the first iPad when it debuted a few years ago and it has gotten heavy use by my wife and son ever since. A few things happened recently. I bought a 13" MacBook Pro, but I haven't completely transferred iTunes from my PC desktop to the MB. That said, when I received this iPad 4 as a gift, I let it sit in the box for a few days while I thought about how I would transfer iTunes to the MB and start the new iPad with a fresh sync. Well, I scrapped that idea and opened the unit anyway. To my surprise, the cloud service automatically copied the apps, calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc to the new unit. I can not describe clear enough what a relief the setup was.I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I'm happy that all of my computing is so much easier the more I have integrated my data into this Apple world. I have used PC's for over 20 years and have never particularly liked Apple. I only wished I had moved over sooner.

Reviews.Title: So far I am happy with my pleased.
Reviews.Author: buddy d
Reviews.Content: I received the IPAD it was fairly easy to be up and running.  I really enjoy using it my computer was an XPERIA so needed to be replaced and so I am happy

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Lochthyme
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4s which I use to take photos.  I then will switch over to my iPad to edit some of them for the convenience of being able to see them better....like the large size screen.  Plus some terrific art apps available for the iPad.  I like the large size, the apps available and the retina display.  If you are looking for a tablet the iPad is a terrific choice especially for those who like to do art.  Whether it be drawing, painting or photography.  Lots of terrific apps out there to meet your needs.  Nice size for working on...not too small.  Nice and portable so you can bring it with you where you go.

Reviews.Title: This is awesome
Reviews.Author: rewreviewer
Reviews.Content: I made the mistake to buy the basic model when it came out, glad my roomate bough it from me, I ran out of space very fast, so I bough this model, lots of space and it just works, seriously not sure why you would spend all that money, on the new ones, when your eyes can't not real tell, if you are looking at a retina display or not.This one is perfect, I can download a few movies to waste my time when traveling, battery is awesome, and I really don't miss anything than the new models have at all.great product, thanks guys

Reviews.Title: BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD
Reviews.Author: Jo Rae Wolf
Reviews.Content: GO BIG OR STAY HOME THIS IS MY 3rd IPAD IT IS BY FAR THE BEST. MEGA STORAGE WILL LAST MY LIFE TIME.VERY EASY TO DO ANYTHING YOU NEED OR WANT. THIS GIRLS NEW BEST FRIEND.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: VESTALIA TORRES
Reviews.Content: Very good product. tough, durable and economical to use that I give. 100 percent recommended for the purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: ipad with issues
Reviews.Author: keith weaver
Reviews.Content: so far my ipad has messed up twice. I did a complete reinstall the first time and this time i am considering contacting the seller to get a replacement for it. My printer is completely compatable with it...HP officjet 8600 wireless....The first time it quit communicating with my network and it caused my printer date and time settings to change...the date jumped ahead a day. I first reset the printer settings and then reset it on my network. The ipad still wouldn't communicate with it so i hooked it to my laptop and did a reinstall. It worked great for maybe 2-3 weeks and yesterday it quit communicating with my printer again only it didn't affect the printer settings. The printer works wirelessly with my other computers fine and i really don't want to do another reinstall as this shouldn't be necessary. Keith Weaver

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4
Reviews.Author: B. Embree "Bet"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Lightweight, easy to install, easily transportable.  Font size adjustable.  Sharp and clear photos.  Makes life so organized because you have everything at your finger tips 24/7

I chose this over the iPad Air due to its specs being similar minus the size and upgraded chip; other than that I couldn't justify spending more for essentially the same device at 128 gigabytes.I upgraded to iOS 7.0.4 right out of the box via wifi in about 15 minutes (it aborted the first time but after plugging it in to the power outlet attempt #2 was a success!)Where I do not love Apple is in having to start from scratch & reload this new iPad with my content from the iPad 2 (no I do not & refuse to use iTunes due to its cumbersome nature & counter-intuitive user interface [I did use iTunes once but when my laptop was stolen & I synced my iPhone 4 to my new laptop iTunes would NOT let me sync it as Apple only allows ONE computer to be physically registered/assigned to an iDevice] so begins the tedious process of porting everything over.I DO though LOVE that Apple's enture suite of software is now available for download for FREE with iOS 7!I will update you all with further observations but judging from my iPad 2 experience I have no doubt i will LOVE this iPad 4 (the retina resolution OMG is a VERY vivid much needed improvement to the iPad). I type flawlessly with my toes on the keyboard and from time to time use my nose as a thumb if you will.[...]

Reviews.Title: Big change from original iPad
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I had the first generation iPad and the new iPad 4 is very nice in comparison.  I decided on it rather than the iPad Air because I didn't see a whole lot of difference in the two for my needs.  I am sure the iPad Air is worth the price difference for many, but the iPad 4 suited me perfectly and I am very pleased with it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Margo
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad for my mom for Christmas could not wait to give it to her.When I gave it to her she was totally surprised and loves it, she uses it everyday.

Reviews.Title: I bought it Used and it came like new
Reviews.Author: Cibert
Reviews.Content: Really Great, When this seller said Like new, He Really mean it. Was Like New in its box pefectly wrapped every accesory was in there.And i paid for it 150 dollars less :)

Reviews.Title: Not a great pad
Reviews.Author: Kitty Cahoon
Reviews.Content: I only had it for 5days when it fell off my night stand and the screen literally crunched into a million tiny pieces. I have iPad1 and ipad2 both have dropped numerous times Never cracked!Dealing with Amazon sucked....the gentleman in customer service was unaudible...in the emails they never sent me an RA.THANKS TO AMEX I'll be compensated.

Reviews.Title: should have bought this long time ago!
Reviews.Author: happily retired
Reviews.Content: I wanted to learn apple products and never had any so I decided to start on something simple.  Needed a little bit of help but you can get that from apple for free.  Love this iPad I bought!

Reviews.Title: Apple does it right
Reviews.Author: Colin L. Love
Reviews.Content: Apple does it right with the i-pad.  They just need to get the  price down a bit to compete better with newcomers to the market.

Reviews.Title: Best... Tablet.... EVER!
Reviews.Author: Michael O'neil
Reviews.Content: Very powerful, easy to use, clear screen that's crystal clear.. All in all, just a very pleasant device to work with...

Reviews.Title: IPad Purchase
Reviews.Author: ROBERT B KEMP
Reviews.Content: I already had an iPad but needed one for my wife.  Since I loaded mine up we only needed a slightly less robust unit and this does the trick

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD WITH RETINA DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: DIXIE BOYD
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT AND IT WORKS GREAT. LOVE THAT IT COMES IN TWO COLORS ALSO. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad with Fintie Black Folio Leather Cover
Reviews.Author: Sally Howard
Reviews.Content: make sure when you purchase your new ipad that you use square trade protection plan to protect your purchases .  Keep your ipad in the Finte Folio case cover to protect your investment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: capt gf pears
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 70 year old Mum and she loves it, easy to use and its got the 64gb memory too.

Reviews.Title: Battery runs down way too fast .....
Reviews.Author: Jeff N. Olsen "Seaeye"
Reviews.Content: Using as an alarm clock ... Start with 100% level at bedtime ... Battery dead before morning ... This Less than one week after purchase ...

Reviews.Title: Good but expensive...
Reviews.Author: AUGUSTO FIGUEIREDO "Augusto"
Reviews.Content: Heavier than predecessor. Battery is running fine. GPS is failing more than its predecessor lo locate and mantain the communication with satellites. Still working on that... Expensive and Apple could finally add at least a card reader or an USB port. iTUNES is a "monster" software.

Reviews.Title: Practically useless for your own creative work
Reviews.Author: E. Rabinovich
Reviews.Content: The function of Copy-Paste practically does not work, and I'd like to meet the  inventor of that feature to understand how he/she could seriously offer this invention to the buyer.  No buttons for navigation except deleting, in case of error you cannot put a cursor in the middle of a word to correct it but need to delete and to rewrite the entire word.Great for reading and communication though.Revised on 10-27-13.  Couple days ago we went to an Apple  store to see what we are doing wrong with Copy-Paste.  Nothing wrong, they could not do what I cannot do myself.  this feature is really terrible.

Reviews.Title: I am better than you !
Reviews.Author: David Feingold "@davidfeingold follow for rev...
Reviews.Content: Windows phone and Nexus phones. Nexus 7 tablet. Desktop Windows 8 and Linux servers.If you would have told me that I would own an iPad, I would have laughed, but I got it as a gift, so I'm definitly enjoying this, but first a few things.1) White sucks. Get black, pictures and video pops better.2) Don't just get a Smart Cover, get a smart case, so the back is protected.3) don't download a billion apps and if you enjoy a free app then buy the paid version. (it's only fair)As for the iPad itself.As I said, white wasn't the best choice, but it's still pretty cool. VERY heavy compared to Galaxy, but also feels much better built. The glass is smooth and slippery so it's easy to swipe around. The apps are the same, the only exception being that on Android, I could use 1Password for free and on the iPad they want 16 bucks. Needless to say I will no longer be purchasing from Agile Bits.The rest of the review.Meh.It's a tablet. You don't really need it, but it's cool to have.Oh yeah, it is a finger print magnet and do not use after eating Cheetos.

Reviews.Title: Kids Love them!!!
Reviews.Author: rich daniels
Reviews.Content: I bought two Ipads one daughter going off to the Navy & my other graduating with her Bachelor's Degree going on to get her Masters the Ipads are very nice a little pricey but the resistance to viruses for apple products was the final seller for me.  So far the kids love them and they work as described.  The seller was great and they arrived very quickly!!

Reviews.Title: Good for fun, not for work...
Reviews.Author: Judsiekitty
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good product just not really what I needed it for. It really doesn't do that much more than the iphone except the display is amazing, it takes really really nice pictures, and the sound is much better than an iphone. You really don't need extra speakers unless you are using it to listen to music and have a larger living space.I bought it because I work online and thought it would be nice and compact to work from but better than my iphone. I NEVER work on it. I mean I can check email and all of that but it's just not a laptop. I should have passed on this and gotten one of the thin little laptops instead.Also if you get one, get some kind of warranty and get a cover for it before it even arrives. It's more fragile than the iphone. I did not have a cover on my iphone when I first got it and dropped it a few times and it was fine. I was in the process of looking for a cover for this ipad and dropped it and the screen cracked. It's going to cost me at least $160 to get a new screen. The more protected it is the more places you will take it and the more use you will get out of it. I was at disney world's magic kingdom a few weeks ago and they have this amazing electric show at night. It looked like an ipad commercial. Everyone was holding up their ipads and recording it. But again I would be hesitant to haul it around without sufficient protection.So the graphics are amazing and it's a fun little gadget to watch movies or play games with.Oh I'm also in a few bible studies and the bible app is WAY better than on the iphone and you can also download books on kindle app. I do this with my bible study workbooks and you can fill it the blanks and answer questions and everything. The youtube app looks good.I'm not sure what else to say other than everything works and it's not defective. I just don't have a lot of money for "toys" so I wish I had gone with the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as a laptop, but hey
Reviews.Author: Xenosaiyan
Reviews.Content: It's much more expensive than a laptop, probably has more graphics power and more reliable, but besides that it's not there yet. Even with the supercharged Apple A6X dual core processor CPU it's still not enough to get rid of the laggggg that I get when I go to different websites and besides that the other issue is that it doesn't do flash, but that's not much of an issue with HTML 5 I can do almost everything a laptop can. I'm using the iPad with a keyboard and it feels almost like a laptop.Not exactly 5 stars, but close, it's a very very very good substitute and the battery life is much better than a laptop/s.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: MARTIN HARO DE LA VEGA
Reviews.Content: I got an Iphone and is my "little" tool in work. But Ipad, is the best for presentations, typing or prepare documents...and PORTABLE.

Reviews.Title: I like this item
Reviews.Author: Diego Barrera
Reviews.Content: The item is okay. It does what supose to do. Is a tablet that really that do the same as my iphone.

Reviews.Title: Very Good.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Crupi
Reviews.Content: Everything went great except it asked if i wanted to add engraving on the back and i did write something but it wasn't done.Got it on time and perfect condition. Thanks

Reviews.Title: It's an AppleThis is the most current and greatest
Reviews.Author: James O. Dawson
Reviews.Content: This is the ongoing evolution of the iPad.More advanced processor and the incredible Retina screen.The virtually bullet proof Gorilla glass screen.If you can afford it there is no other tablet like it.

Reviews.Title: I love It!
Reviews.Author: Maci
Reviews.Content: I like the white better than the black, it has a nicer look.  Nothing comes close to the iPad it's so much fun.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice

Reviews.Content: I bought it at 520 (include the tax) , so it's abut a 20 bucks save.Works just like a ipad 3 gen, the display is very descent.I can hardly notice any improvement on performance though.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The spectacular 9.7 inch Retina Display in Apple's full-size iPad is now matched with a custom System-on-Chip (SoC) that has the graphic muscle to take full advantage of its capabilities. The screen on this iPad is incredible! It totally blows away my HDTV.The 4th generation iPad also offers an overall speedier response than the 3rd generation model, along with the tiny new Lightning connector instead of a traditional 30-pin type. If you have a lot of peripherals that fit the older connector, you will need to a buy an adaptor if you want to keep using themI find myself using the iPad for roughly 80% of the activities that I used to do on my laptop. It is now my first choice for web browsing, and it is great for reading e-books. And it is more and more often my preferred way to watch movies and TV programs.Before buying, I compared this iPad to other high-quality tablets such as the 10-inch Nexus. As far as the displays go, the iPad was the clear winner. If the quality of the graphics is high on your list of priorities for a tablet, the 4th generation iPad is far and away the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Meyers
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I have used the previous generations (I work in IT). The retina display and thee processors (central and graphics) are awesome. The display is slick and smooth like water and amazingly clear. The response time is awesome. Videos are super clear in HD and games on this thing rock! The WiFi speeds are great. I am also using it for GarageBand which is like getting a portable recording studio for $5. I have traditionally been a Windows/Microsoft guy, but this thing just blows me away. I have several Andriod devices, which are very good too, but what this does, it does at a level that is unmatched. If you're thinking about buying and haven't used one much, just do it... you won't be sorry.
